Insikt Inc. | Data Architect + Sr. BE Engineer + FE Engineer + Risk Analyst + Product Strategy|San Francisco & Los Angeles, CA | Onsite, will transfer H1B

Come join a collaborative team whose mission is to bring trust and transparency back to the world of lending and securitization while helping underserved families and small businesses find affordable credit options.

Our codebase is mostly Java and Javascript FE: JavaScript - Angular moving to React BE: MongoDB moving to PostgreSQL Based on our stack, the opportunity to learn is: ReactJS and Redux, Middle layer development using Javascript on Koa, Microservices built using Java and managed using Spring Cloud, also the ability to learn Hibernate, AWS, Elastic, Kubernetes, Consumer Lending Financial Domain

Feel free to email me your CV at smarraccini [at] company-name.com if you'd like to chat. In the subject line, please use this format - HackerNews / Position
